dlg_about:
Here everything is same as Update V2 but in update V2 you may face size error in dialog box in different different devices but here all the things were fixed and it will work fine in every device..Click preview then Tutorial to understand how to implement and how it looks in other devices.. Alright..

But please note , 
Normal Update V2 you need to put version name to show update dialog in your user app but here in Upgraded Update V2 you need to put Version code instead of Version name  remember it.



Watch Tutorial to understand more üî•üî•
asset_json_file_name: No need For Update Based Dialog
instructions_after_patch: Please read all instructions that given in ReadME.txt file

dlg_design_data_for_apply.More_Info:
If you set version update "yes" then your Dialog will show when your input version(Server) is not equal to current version of user's installed app.. else

 if you set version update "No" then the dialog will show one time only ..
dlg_design_data_for_apply.radioBtn1_info: As you have turned on the Version mode update you should enter version code below üëá
dlg_design_data_for_apply.radioBtn2_info:
As you turned off the version mode.. now user can see only one time the Update Dialog.. If you again Update then user will show again that dialog üëç

In version code place add any Random number but don't leave it blank alright üëç

dlg_design_data_for_apply.More_Info: Please enter version code.. not version name remember it ..Any confusion ask in group
If you set Cancel button visible then cancel button will show when you send user update... else if you set Invisible then cancel button will not show any more on User app.
dlg_design_data_for_apply.radioBtn1_info: Please add Everything in cancel button details.. Because you enable it..üëç
dlg_design_data_for_apply.radioBtn2_info: Now you have disable it.. so you can fill anything in below cancel button design.. but please input something to generate your encryted json.. remember it üëç
